mapper.insert: insert into relation_positive(sponsor, recipient, relation_type, relation_source, refresh_time, status) values (#{relationDetail.sponsor}, #{relationDetail.recipient}, #{relationDetail.relationType}, #{relationDetail.relationSource}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) * 1000, 0)
mapper.select: select sponsor, recipient, relation_type, relation_source, refresh_time, status from relation_positive where (sponsor = #{uin} or recipient= #{uin}) and relation_type = 40
